title: The Muse
description: Taryn the creator of The Muse will have you follow her journey of everlasting love . . .  Creating The Muse was derived in Tarynâ€™s imagination to keep her identity hidden. The delicately winged symbol has gracefully touched so many lives. From a fluttering thought to the formation of a business plan, her life is continuing on with the path of assisting others.  The Crossing Series (The Knot Hole, The Passage and The Muse) will take you on a romantic journey from many years past to the present. An endearing exploration for so very many lives. Now is the TIME that Taryn can begin to help herself determine what she needs to complete her life and find her true happiness. Having opened herself from the unbelievable to the believable. Could Silas ever fit into her present life and stay with her forever if he traveled through time and found her?
author: Renee Lee Fisher
